# UITextSmartQuotesType.yes

**Case**

Enable smart quotes.

## Declaration

```swift
case yes
```

## Constants

- **UITextSmartQuotesType.default**: Use the default smart quote behavior.
- **UITextSmartQuotesType.no**: Disable smart quotes.
